column4: Question: I have Ubuntu v.7.10 w/gutsy and was wondering where if I have the file .conkyrc and if I dont have such file can you steer me in the right direction for modifing my desktop thanks (newvie)
of show hidden in file manager
open a terminal and type ls -a  you are in your home dir when you first open the terminal and that is where all the 'hidden' config files are. these are your profile config files and each user has em
